long_description: You'll love the cool feel of the women's Marmot Mirage T-Shirt during warm days on the trail, around the neighborhood or in the gym. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric helps protect skin from harsh UV light with a UPF rating of 40, and mesh panels enhance ventilation. Flatlock seams reduce chafing, and tag-free neckline won't irritate skin. Reflective logos enhance visibility in dim light. The Marmot Mirage T-Shirt for women is semifitted with a droptail hem for increased coverage.
short_description: You'll love the cool feel of the women's Marmot Mirage T-Shirt during warm days on the trail, around the neighborhood or in the gym.
